reviews.review_msg: Absolutely no denying that IW is a highly knowledgable, passionate, and engaging professor. It is a tough class and understandably some may be frustrated that all class material not on exams, but ended up taking so much more away from course than simply completing credit - everlasting knowledge about the world's history. (Ps. I'm not a geo major).

Ivor is one of the best profs I have ever had! He is a super hard marker and his exams are little unfair but it makes you work hard and he is the kind of prof you strive to impress! If you are not interested in what he is teaching he will find a way to make it interesting to you!... Just dont expect an easy grade...
